common.tagline: Video-based kinematic analysis for athletic performance

errors.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 500MB. Selected file is {{size}}MB
errors.invalidFileType: Please select a valid video file

results.heading: Analysis Results
results.issuesDetected: Issues detected that may affect accuracy.

feedback.heading: Share Your Feedback
feedback.helpText: Help us improve Kinemotion by sharing your experience and suggestions

database.defaultMessage: Coach feedback and data storage features are currently unavailable.

errors.networkError: Unable to connect to the analysis server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.serverError: Server error occurred during analysis. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
errors.fileTooLarge: Video file is too large. Please use a video smaller than 500MB.
errors.invalidRequest: Invalid video file or request. Please ensure you selected a valid video file.
errors.timeout: Analysis took too long. Please try with a shorter video or try again later.
errors.contactSupport: If this problem persists, please contact support with the following information:

jumpHeightM.label: Jump Height (m)
jumpHeightM.description: Maximum height achieved during the jump

jumpHeightCm.label: Jump Height (cm)
jumpHeightCm.description: Maximum height achieved during the jump

flightTimeMs.label: Flight Time (ms)
flightTimeMs.description: Time spent in the air during the jump

flightTimeS.label: Flight Time (s)
flightTimeS.description: Time spent in the air during the jump

groundContactTimeMs.label: Ground Contact Time
groundContactTimeMs.description: Time with feet in contact with the ground

reactiveStrengthIndex.label: RSI
reactiveStrengthIndex.description: Jump height divided by ground contact time

takeoffVelocityMps.label: Takeoff Velocity
takeoffVelocityMps.description: Vertical velocity at the moment of takeoff

countermovementDepthM.label: Countermovement Depth (m)
countermovementDepthM.description: Depth of the squat during countermovement

countermovementDepthCm.label: Countermovement Depth (cm)
countermovementDepthCm.description: Depth of the squat during countermovement

landingForceNormalized.label: Landing Force
landingForceNormalized.description: Landing force relative to body weight

peakPowerW.label: Peak Power
peakPowerW.description: Maximum power output during the jump

peakEccentricVelocityMs.label: Peak Eccentric Velocity
peakEccentricVelocityMs.description: Maximum velocity during the downward phase

peakConcentricVelocityMs.label: Peak Concentric Velocity
peakConcentricVelocityMs.description: Maximum velocity during the upward phase

transitionTimeMs.label: Transition Time
transitionTimeMs.description: Time between end of eccentric and start of concentric phase

lowestPointFrame.label: Lowest Point Frame
lowestPointFrame.description: Frame number at lowest point of squat

loading.estimatedTime: This typically takes 10-60 seconds depending on video length

auth.signUpSubtitle: Create an account to analyze jump videos
auth.signInSubtitle: Sign in to analyze jump videos

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

auth.success: Check your email for confirmation link!

feedback.heading: Coach Feedback - {{jumpType}} Analysis
feedback.subtitle: Share your insights and coaching notes for this analysis
feedback.notesHelp: Focus on actionable coaching points and specific observations about the movement quality.

errorBoundary.heading: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the issue persists.
